snippet: Pour in the wine, then fill an insert with ice cubes and cool the wine from the inside out.
abstract: New gadget for chilling wine is simple glass carafe with an insert for ice, pour in wine, fill with ice cubes and cool the wine from the inside out.
lead_paragraph: Pour in the wine, then fill an insert with ice cubes and cool the wine from the inside out.
